eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
 H_P = -{\vec D}^2-\mu{\vec\sigma}\cdot
  {\vec B}({\vec x}) +U({\vec x})
\label{hp1} \\
(\hbar=c=2m=1)\qquad \vec D\equiv \vec\partial-ie\vec A({\vec x})
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray} H^{(0)}&=&
S^+S^-=-{\bf D}^2+(\partial_i \chi)^2-e\sigma_2B_2-\sigma_3\Delta\chi \label{facD1}\\
H^{(1)}&=&S^-S^+=-{\bf D}^2+(\partial_i \chi)^2+e\sigma_2B_2+2\sigma_1\partial_1\partial_3\chi+
\sigma_3(\partial_1^2-\partial_3^2)\chi \label{facD2}\\
B_2&\equiv& \partial_3A_1-\partial_1A_3\qquad i=1,3.\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\widetilde H}^{(0)}= {\widetilde S}^+{\widetilde S}^-\qquad
{\widetilde H}^{(1)}={\widetilde S}^-{\widetilde S}^+ \qquad
{\widetilde S}^-\equiv \cal{U}S^-\cal{V}^+\qquad {\widetilde
S}^+\equiv \cal{V}S^+\cal{U}^+=  ({\widetilde S}^-)^\dagger.
\label{factil}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\widetilde H}^{(1)} {\widetilde S}^-={\widetilde S}^-{\widetilde
H}^{(0)}\qquad {\widetilde S}^+{\widetilde H}^{(1)}= {\widetilde
H}^{(0)} {\widetilde S}^+\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\widetilde \psi}^{(0)} ({\bf x} ;E_{n})= E_n^{-1/2} {\widetilde S}^{+}{\widetilde \psi}^{(1)} ({\bf x} ;E_{n}) \nonumber\\
{\widetilde \psi}^{(1)} ({\bf x} ;E_{n})= E_n^{-1/2} {\widetilde
S}^{-}{\widetilde \psi^{(0)} } ({\bf x} ;E_{n}). \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\underline {\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(0)}={\widetilde Q}_l^+{\widetilde
Q}_l^-\qquad {\underline {\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(0)}={\widetilde
P}_l^+{\widetilde P}_l^-\qquad {\widetilde
H}_{lm}^{(1)}={\widetilde Q}_l^-{\widetilde Q}_m^+
+{\widetilde P}_l^-{\widetilde P}_m^+\label{quasyfac}\\
{\widetilde P}_l^+{\widetilde Q}_l^-={\widetilde Q}_l^+{\widetilde
P}_l^-=0 \qquad l,m=1,3.\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\widetilde H}_{lm}^{(1)}{\widetilde Q}_m^-&=& {\widetilde
Q}_l^-{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(0)}\qquad {\widetilde
Q}_l^+{\widetilde H}_{lm}^{(1)}=
{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(0)}{\widetilde Q}_m^+\nonumber\\
{\widetilde H}_{lm}^{(1)}{\widetilde P}_m^-&=& {\widetilde
P}_l^-{\underline {\widetilde H}}^{(0)}\qquad {\widetilde
P}_l^+{\widetilde H}_{lm}^{(1)}= {\underline {\widetilde
H}}^{(0)}{\widetilde P}_m^+\qquad l,m=1,3. \label{gensusy}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\widetilde H}_{lm}^{(1)}= {\underline {\widetilde
H}}_{lm}^{(1)}+{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}_{lm}^{(1)}\qquad {\underline
{\widetilde H}}^{(1)}_{lm}\equiv {\widetilde Q}_l^-{\widetilde
Q}_m^+\qquad {\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(1)}_{lm}\equiv
{\widetilde P}_l^-{\widetilde P}_m^+
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\underline {\widetilde H}}_{lm}^{(1)}{\widetilde Q}_m^-&=& {\widetilde
Q}_l^-{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(0)}\qquad {\widetilde Q}_l^+{\underline
{\widetilde H}}_{lm}^{(1)}=
{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}^{(0)}{\widetilde Q}_m^+\nonumber\\
{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}_{lm}^{(1)}{\widetilde P}_m^-&=&
{\widetilde P}_l^-{\underline {\widetilde H}}^{(0)}\qquad {\widetilde
P}_l^+{\underline{\underline {\widetilde H}}}_{lm}^{(1)}= {\underline {\widetilde
H}}^{(0)}{\widetilde P}_m^+\qquad l,m=1,3. \label{decomp}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 B_1=-{2\over e}{\rm Im\,} g''\qquad
 B_3=-{2\over e}{\rm Re\,} g''-{1\over e}F''\qquad A_2=-{2\over e}{\rm Re\,} g'-{1\over e}F'+const.\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
B_1=-{2\over e}{\rm Im\,} g''\qquad B_3=-{2\over e}{\rm Re\,} g''\qquad
A_2=-{2\over e}{\rm Re\,} g'+C.\nonumber
\

R^\pm\to \hat R^\pm&=&
\mp\biggl[\sigma_1D_1+\sigma_3D_3-i(k+eA_2)\sigma_2\biggr]+V_0;\label{hatR}\\
\check H^{(0)}\to\hat H^{(0)}&=&-{\bf D}^2+(k+eA_2)^2-\vec\sigma\cdot

V_0+e\vec B)+V_0^2=\hat R^+\hat R^-;\label{hatH0}\\
